name: homehealth-features
description: HomeHealth common and core features Monorepo
author: HomeHealth

scripts.publish: cd packages/homehealth-common-feature && npm publish && cd ../homehealth-core-feature && npm publish
scripts.build: lerna exec --parallel --scope homehealth-* -- babel --root-mode upward src -d dist --ignore **/*.specs.js, __tests__/*.js --copy-files
scripts.start:mobile: yarn build && yarn workspace hh_sample_mobile start
scripts.clean: npx lerna clean --yes && rm -rf node_modules && npx lerna exec yarn clean:dist --ignore sample_app && rm -rf packages/example-apps/hh_sample_mobile/ios/build && rm -rf packages/example-apps/hh_sample_mobile/android/app/build
scripts.reset: yarn clean && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-* && rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn cache clean --force && yarn install && yarn start -- --reset-cache
